function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in construction sites due to lack of preventive measures","Impact":"Increased risk of infections and outbreaks among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, providing personal protective equipment, and regular testing","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring social distancing and contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, supervisors, and other site personnel","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Financial strain on construction industry leading to project termination","Impact":"Loss of jobs, economic downturn, and halted infrastructure development","Mitigation":"Government financial aid, support for cash flow, and targeted assistance for struggling contractors","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, economic forecasting tools, and budgeting software","People":"Contractors, construction workers, and industry stakeholders","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Ineffective communication and coordination among industry players","Impact":"Delayed project timelines, mismanagement of resources, and increased risk of errors and accidents","Mitigation":"Regular coordination meetings, clear communication channels, and training on crisis response","Technologies":"Project management software, communication platforms, and virtual collaboration tools","People":"Industry players, project managers, and government authorities","Owner":"Project managers, industry associations, and government authorities"}]}
